class_notes: (A-Term enrollment ended July 16) (Instructor: Christian Smith) (ON CAMPUS)
course_description: This course explores the meaning of religion as a dimension of all social life: ritual, myth, and symbolic reality; churches as organizations and institutions; different social identities and situations among the faithful; secularization and revival, conflict and change in globalization and liberation.
